Title: The new Police Commissioner
Content: Sandeep Khirwar, the new Police Commissioner of Gurgaon, is an IIT graduate from Delhi. He has earlier served in Kaithal, Hisar, Yamunagar and Faridabad in Haryana. He also had a brief stint as DIG in
Author: Staff Reporter
